remarks: Part of proof of Lemma N of [Crawley] p. 121 line 36.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Feb-2014.)
statement:
cdlemn10.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdlemn10.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemn10.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemn10.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemn10.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemn10.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemn10.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemn10 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) /\ ( S e. A /\ -. S .<_ W ) /\ ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) ) /\ ( g e. T /\ ( g ` Q ) = S /\ ( R ` g ) .<_ X ) ) -> S .<_ ( Q .\/ X ) ) $.
